pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![build](https://github.com/SystemRDL/PeakRDL-systemrdl/workflows/build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/SystemRDL/PeakRDL-systemrdl/actions?query=workflow%3Abuild+branch%3Amain)[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/peakrdl-systemrdl.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/peakrdl-systemrdl)# PeakRDL-systemrdlExport a compiled register model into SystemRDL code.Useful when converting from other imported file formats.For the command line tool, see the [PeakRDL project](https://peakrdl.readthedocs.io).
